page.title: 15Bramhope: Interesting People
page.content: Over the last 40 yrs,residents have witnessed;road improvements leading to increased traffic;the building of many houses,two schools and a health centre;and a change in shop usage. One lady who has lived in the village for 38 yrs,remembers how most of them were situated by The Cross,another,the fields around Bramhope,many of which are now housing developments.Elderly residents are happy with the changes, except for the traffic noise.Although grateful for the travelling library, would appreciate a permanent building. They welcome the weekly bus to a nearby supermarket but would not like to see one built in Bramhope.The majority prefer Bramhope the way it is now. The absence of entertainment for the young and the streetlighting in some areas is offset by other good amenities and the friendly community.
